Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-5918 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-20
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-5918 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-20. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-20, affected by CVE-2025-5918
